value: content=Bisterne Close, Burley. If you are interested in a little independence and space, consider renting a cottage. Twin Cottage, in the heart of the New Forest, is a beautifully furnished two bedroom cottage with a fully equipped kitchen, wireless internet and is great for children.

content=Located within walking distance of Burley Village Center, " Three beautiful self catering cottages in the heart of the New Forest in the lovely village of Burley. Our high quality, pet friendly accommodation has 2&3 bedrooms (2-8 adults/children + Baby). Group bookings available.
